enrichedWines.description: A unique white wine from the historic Alella DO near Barcelona, presented in magnum format. This aged white showcases the indigenous Pansa Blanca grape and the unique Mediterranean microclimate of coastal Catalonia.

tastingNotes.aroma: Mature and complex with aromas of golden apple, honey, and dried apricot from aging. Notes of toasted almond, butterscotch, and subtle oxidative character add depth. Hints of beeswax and Mediterranean herbs provide regional character.
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with softened acidity from age. Rich flavors of ripe orchard fruit, honey, and nuts. The wine shows developed tertiary character with notes of caramel and spice. Creamy texture with balanced oxidation.
tastingNotes.finish: Long, nutty finish with persistent fruit and gentle warmth.

servingInfo.decanting: 30 minutes to allow wine to open

wineDetails.style: Aged white wine in magnum format

enrichedWines.description: A fresh South African white blend combining aromatic Viognier with the structure and minerality of Chenin Blanc. Bloem showcases modern Cape winemaking with vibrant fruit and balance.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromatic and complex with white flowers, stone fruit, and citrus. Viognier adds apricot and honeysuckle while Chenin contributes green apple and minerality.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with crisp acidity. Stone fruit flavors with citrus zest and floral notes. Good texture and balance between varieties.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, refreshing finish with lingering fruit and floral notes.

enrichedWines.description: A unique white blend from Tarpon Cellars in California, showcasing creative winemaking and interesting variety combinations.

tastingNotes.aroma: Fresh with citrus, white flowers, and subtle tropical notes. Clean and inviting aromatics.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with bright acidity. Citrus and stone fruit flavors with mineral backbone. Balanced and food-friendly.

enrichedWines.productName: Jean Michel Champagne Rose Brut Mevushal
enrichedWines.description: A kosher Champagne rosé made through the Mevushal process to maintain religious certification. This wine combines traditional Champagne winemaking with kosher requirements.

tastingNotes.aroma: Delicate with red berry fruit, citrus, and brioche notes from traditional method production. Subtle floral and yeasty character.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with fine bubbles and crisp acidity. Red berry flavors with citrus and mineral notes. Dry Brut style.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, refreshing finish with persistent bubbles.

enrichedWines.productName: Shabo Sparkling Primo Secco Semi Sweet White NV
enrichedWines.description: A semi-sweet sparkling wine from Shabo Winery in Ukraine, offering approachable bubbles with gentle sweetness for easy drinking.

tastingNotes.aroma: Fruity and fresh with white flowers, citrus, and subtle sweetness. Approachable aromatics.
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with gentle bubbles and balanced sweetness. Citrus and stone fruit with refreshing finish.
tastingNotes.finish: Soft, sweet finish with lingering fruit.

enrichedWines.description: A traditional Clarete-style rosé from Rioja's Ontañón winery. Clarete is a historic Spanish style with light red color, traditionally made by co-fermenting red and white grapes.

tastingNotes.aroma: Fresh with red berry fruit, citrus, and floral notes. Subtle herbal character typical of Rioja.
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with crisp acidity. Red cherry and strawberry with mineral backbone. Dry and refreshing.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean finish with lingering berry fruit.

wineDetails.grapeVariety: Tempranillo and Viura blend (traditional Clarete style)

enrichedWines.description: A fresh, young Pinot Grigio from the Delle Venezie IGT region in northeastern Italy, showcasing the crisp, clean style that made this variety popular worldwide.

tastingNotes.aroma: Clean and fresh with green apple, pear, and citrus. Subtle floral notes and minerality.
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with bright acidity. Crisp citrus and orchard fruit flavors. Clean and refreshing.
tastingNotes.finish: Light, clean finish with subtle fruit.

enrichedWines.productName: Valdemar Estates Walla Walla Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
enrichedWines.description: A premium Cabernet Sauvignon from Valdemar Estates in Walla Walla Valley, Washington, one of the state's most prestigious wine regions known for structured, elegant reds.

tastingNotes.aroma: Complex with blackcurrant, dark cherry, and cedar. Notes of vanilla, mocha, and subtle herbs from oak aging.
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with structured tannins and balanced acidity. Concentrated dark fruit with layers of spice, earth, and oak. Elegant and refined.
tastingNotes.finish: Long finish with persistent fruit and fine-grained tannins.

enrichedWines.description: An approachable Prosecco offering fresh bubbles and fruit character for casual enjoyment and celebrations.

tastingNotes.aroma: Fresh with green apple, pear, and white flowers. Clean and inviting.
tastingNotes.palate: Light-bodied with fine bubbles and crisp acidity. Citrus and orchard fruit flavors. Slightly off-dry and refreshing.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean finish with lingering fruit and bubbles.

enrichedWines.description: A kosher-certified Chardonnay from Chateau Josephine, offering quality wine that meets religious dietary requirements with distribution in the Mid-Atlantic region.

tastingNotes.aroma: Clean with citrus, green apple, and subtle oak. Notes of vanilla and toasted nuts.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with balanced acidity. Citrus and stone fruit flavors with creamy texture from oak aging.
tastingNotes.finish: Smooth finish with lingering fruit and subtle oak.
